articles.description: Holders Manchester City and Real Madrid share six goals in a thriller at the Bernabeu to leave their Champions League quarter-final evenly poised.
articles.title: Man City and Real Madrid evenly poised after classic

articles.description: The furthest inside the ropes, the closest to the stars - a caddie's role extends far beyond carrying bags and wiping clubs.
articles.title: Masters 2024: 'A sporting role like no other' - the role of a golf caddie

articles.description: Leandro Trossard's second-half equaliser earns Arsenal a draw with Bayern Munich in the first leg of their Champions League quarter-final.
articles.title: Kane scores as Arsenal draw with Bayern Munich

articles.description: Tottenham monitoring Athletic forward Williams, Newcastle close to agreeing Joelinton deal, PSG and Barcelona keen on Liverpool's Diaz, plus more.
articles.title: Tottenham monitoring Athletic forward Williams - Wednesday's gossip

articles.description: Spanish tennis player Aaron Cortes is banned from the sport until 2039 by the International Tennis Integrity Agency after admitting to corruption charges.
articles.title: Spanish tennis player Aaron Cortes banned to 2039 for corruption

articles.description: Ruben Amorim is being strongly linked with Liverpool, so what is the style of Sporting Lisbon's coach and could he be the right man to replace Jurgen Klopp?
articles.title: 'A similar approach to Klopp' - lowdown on Amorim

articles.description: World champion Luke Humphries is beaten in the final of the eighth Players Championship event following Luke Littler's early exit.
articles.title: Players Championship: Luke Humphries beaten in final after Luke Littler's early exit

articles.description: England pick up their first win of Euro 2025 qualifying with a comfortable display against the Republic of Ireland at the Aviva Stadium.
articles.title: Lionesses get first win of Euro 2025 qualifying

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo is sent off for elbowing an opponent during Al-Nassr's 2-1 Saudi Super Cup semi-final defeat by Al-Hilal.
articles.title: Ronaldo sent off in Al-Nassr cup semi-final defeat

articles.description: Rory McIlroy will get his 10th attempt to complete the career Grand Slam under way at 15:42 BST on Thursday when the Masters starts at Augusta National.
articles.title: Masters tee-times for rounds one and two: McIlroy, Woods, Rahm & Scheffler pairings
